translations: v.感到极其痛苦，受折磨；使（某人）极度痛苦，折磨（等于 agonize）

sentences.sentence: WHEN New York agonises over its place in the world, it is usually because it fears losing its position as the world's financial capital. That has certainly been the case in recent months.
sentences.translation: 纽约通常因为担心自己丧失全球金融首都的地位而痛苦焦灼，数月以来，确系如此。
